text.language: Tote afhwc n~je Mwu~c/c nem nens/ri m~Pic#l# e~taihwd/ n~te P[oic ouoh afjoc eyroujoc: je marenhwc e~Po#c#: je qen ouw~ou gar af[iw~ou.
Then Moses and the children of Israel sang this song to the Lord, and spoke saying, “Let us sing to the Lord for He has triumphed gloriously.”

language.div: Musa dan bangsa Israel
nyanyikan lagu ini bagi Tuhan dan berkata/, “Mari nyanyi bagi Tuhan
s'bab Ia t’lah menang dengan gemilang."

text.language: حينئذ سبح موسى وبنو اسرائيل بهذه التسبحة للرب وقالوا فلنسبح للرب لانه بالمجد قد تمجد.
Ouh~yo nem ou[acih~yo afberbwrou e~v~iom: oubo/~yoc nem ourefhwbc e~bol hijwi: afswpi n/i n~oucwt/ria~.
The horse and its rider, He has thrown into the sea. The Lord is my strength and song, and He has become my salvation.

language.div: Kuda dan penunggang-nya, Dia telah lempar ke laut. Tuhan itu kekuatanku dan mazmurku,
Ia telah menjadi kes’lamatanku.

text.language: الفرس وراكبه طرحهما فى البحر معينى وساترى صار لى خلاصآ.
Vai pe Panou] ]na]w~ou naf: V] m~paiwt ]na[acf.
He is my God and I will glorify Him, my father’s God and I will exalt Him.

language.div: Dia Allahku ku ‘kan muliakan Dia, Dia Alla~h Bapaku dan ku ‘kan tinggikan Dia.

text.language: هذا هو إلهى فأمجده أله أبى فأرفعه.
Po#c# petqomqem n~nibwtc: Po#c# pe pefran: nibere[woutc n~te Varaw~ nem tefjom t/rc afberbwrou e~v~iom.
The Lord is a man of war, the Lord is His name. Pharaoh’s chariots and his army He has cast into the sea.

language.div: Tuhan Dialah yang berperang, Tuhanlah nama-Nya Kereta Firaun dan pasukannya Dia lempar ke laut.

text.language: الرب مكسر الحروب الرب إسمه مركبات فرعون وكل قوته طرحهما فى البحر.
Hancwtp n~a~nabat/c n~t~rictat/c afjolkou qen v~iom n~sari.
His chosen captains also drowned in the Red Sea.

language.div: Kapten pilihannya juga tenggelam di Laut Merah.

text.language: ركبانا منتخبين ذى ثلاث جنبات غرقهم فى البحر الأحمر.
Afhwbc e~h~r/i e~jwou n~je pimwou: auwmc e~q~r/i e~pets/k m~v~r/] n~ouw~ni.
The depths have covered them; they sank to the bottom like a stone.

language.div: Kedalaman tutupi m’reka m’reka tenggelam ke dasar s’perti batu

text.language: غطاهم الماء أنغمسوا إلى العمق مثل الحجر.
Tekoui~nam Po#c# ac[iw~ou qen oujom: tekjij n~oui~nam Panou] actake nekjaji.
Your right hand, O Lord, has become glorious in power. Your right hand, O Lord, has dashed the enemy in pieces.

language.div: Tangan kanan-Mu, ya Tuhan, Mulia berkuasa. Tangan kanan-Mu, ya Tuhan, hancurkan musuh-Mu

text.language: يمينُك يارب تمجدت بالقوة يدك اليمنى ياإلهى أهلكت أعداءك.
Qen p~a~sai n~te pekw~ou akqomqem n~n/et]oub/n: akouwrp m~pekjwnt afouo~mou m~v~r/] n~hanrwoui~.
And in the greatness of Your excellence, You have overthrown those who rose against You. You sent forth Your wrath, it consumed them like stubble.

language.div: Dengan keluhuran-Mu yang besar, Kau runtuhkan m’reka yang melawan-Mu, Kau kirimkan api murka-Mu, Yang memakan m’reka bak jerami

text.language: بكثرة مجدك سحقت الذين يقاوموننا أرسلت غضبك فأكلهم مثل الهشيم.
Ebolhiten pip#n#a# n~te pekm~bon afo~hi e~ratf n~je pimwou: au[ici n~je nimwou m~v~r/] n~oucobt: au[wc n~je nijol qen y~m/] m~v~iom.
And with the blast of Your nostrils the waters were gathered together, the flood stood upright like a heap, and the depths congealed in the heart of the sea.

language.div: Dengan hembusan nafas-Mu, air berkumpul, berdiri tegak bak tembok, dan membeku di kedalaman tengah laut

text.language: وبروح غضبك وقف الماء وارتفعت المياء مثل السور وجمدت الأمواج فى وسط البحر.
Afjoc gar n~je pijaji: je ]na[oji n~tataho: n~tavws n~hanswl: n~tat~cio~ n~ta'u,/: n~taqwteb qen tac/fi: n~te tajij ero#c#.
The enemy said, “I will pursue, I will overtake, I will divide the spoil, my desire shall be satisfied on them, I will draw my sword, and my hand shall destroy them.”

language.div: Kata Musuh, ku ’kan kejar, kususul, kubagi jarahan, Ku puaskan nafsuku, ku hunuskan pedangku dan tanganku ‘kan hancurkan mereka."

text.language: قال العدو انى أسرع فأدرك وأقسم الغنائم وأشبع نفسى وأقتل بسيفى ويدى تتسلط.
Akouwrp m~pekp#n#a# afhobcou n~je v~iom: auwmc e~pec/t m~v~r/] n~outath qen hanmwou euos.
You blew with Your wind, the sea covered them, they sank like lead in the mighty waters.

language.div: Kau tiup denga~n topan-Mu, laut menu-tu-pi m’reka, M’reka tenggelam s’perti timah di perairan yang kuat.

text.language: أرسلت روحك فغطاهم البحر وغطسوا الى أسفل كالرصاص فى مياه كثيرة.
Nim eto~ni m~mok qen ninou] Po#c#: nim eto~ni m~mok: e~au]w~ou nak qen n/e#y#u# n~tak: euers~v/ri m~mok qen ouw~ou: eki~ri n~hans~v/ri.
Who is like You, O Lord, among the gods? Who is like You, glorified in His saints, amazing in glory, performing wonders?

language.div: Siapa s’perti-Mu, ya Tuhan di antara para allah? Siapa s’perti-Mu, mulia di antara para kudus-Nya, dahsyat dalam kemuliaan, melakukan keajaiban..

text.language: من يشبهك فى الآلهة يارب من يشبهك ممجدا فى قديسيك متعجبا منك بالمجد صانعا عجائب.
Akcouten tekoui~nam e~bol afomkou n~je p~kahi: ak[imwit qajwf m~peklaoc qen oumeym/i: vai e~takcotpf ak]jom naf qen teknom]: euma n~emton efouab nak.
You stretched out Your right hand, the earth swallowed them. You, in Your mercy, have led forth the people whom You have redeemed. You have guided them, in Your strength, to Your holy habitation.

language.div: Kau ulurkan tangan kanan-Mu, bumi telan m’reka. Dalam kasih setia-Mu Kau memimpin m’reka yang telah Engkau tebus, Kau bimbing m’reka dengan kuat-Mu, ke tempat kudus-Mu..

text.language: مددت يمينك فابتلعتهم الأرض هديت شعبك بالحقيقة هذا الذى اخترته وقويته بتعزيتك الى موضع راحة قدسك.
Aucwtem n~je haneynoc ouoh aujwnt: hannakhi au[i n~n/etsop qen Nivulictim.
The people will hear and be afraid; sorrow will take hold of the inhabitants of Palestine.
Bangsa-bangsa men-dengarnya dan takut, kegentaran ‘kan menguasai penduduk Filistin.
سمعت الأمم وغضبت والمخاض أخذ سكان فلسطين.
Tote aui/c m~mwou n~je nih/gemwn n~te Edwm: niar,wn n~te Nimwa~bit/c ouc~yerter pe e~taf[itou.
Then the chiefs of Edom will be dismayed, the mighty men of Moab, trembling, will take hold of them.
Lalu pemimpin Edom jadi heran, orang Moab yang perkasa Jadi gemetar.
حينئذ أسرع ولاة أدوم ورؤساء المؤابيين أخذتهم الرعدة.
Aubwl e~bol n~je ouon niben etsop qen <anaan: afi~ e~h~r/i e~jwou n~je ouc~yerter nem ouho].
All the inhabitants of Canaan will melt away; fear and dread will fall on them.

language.div: Penduduk Kanaan akan luluh, takut dan gentar akan menimpa m’reka.

text.language: ذاب كل سكان كنعان وأتت عليهم الرعدة والخوف.
Qen p~a~sai n~te pekj~voi marouerw~ni: satefcini n~je peklaoc Po#c# satefcini n~je peklaoc: vai e~takj~vof.
By the greatness of Your arm, they will be as still as a stone, till Your people pass over, O Lord, till Your people pass over whom You have purchased.

language.div: Oleh hebatnya tangan-Mu mereka terdiam s’perti batu, sampai umat-Mu lewat ya Tuhan, sampai umat-Mu lewat, M’reka yang telah Engkau beli..

text.language: بكثرة ساعدك فليصيروا كالحجر حتى يجتاز شعبك يارب حتى يجتاز شعبك هذا الذى اقتنيته.
Anitou e~qoun tojou hijen outwou n~te tekk~l/ronomia~: nem e~qoun e~pekman~swpi etcebtwt: vai e~takerhwb e~rof Po#c#.
You will bring them in, and plant them in the mountain of Your inheritance, in the place, O Lord, which You have made for Your own dwelling.

language.div: Bawalah m’reka masuk
dan tanamlah di gunung pusaka-Mu, di tempat yang t’lah Kau siapkan untuk-Mu berdiam ya Tuhan.

text.language: أدخلهم وأغرسهم على جبل ميراثك وفى مسكنك المعد هذا الذى صنعته يارب.
Pekma e#y#u# Po#c# v/e~taucebtwtf n~je nekjij: Po#c# ekoi n~ouro sa e~neh nem icjen p~e~neh ouoh e~ti.
Your sanctuary, O Lord, which Your hands have established, the Lord shall reign forever and ever.

language.div: Di tempat kudus-Mu ya Tuhan yang tangan-Mu telah dirikan, Ya Tuhan, kau ‘kan memerintah selamala-manya..

text.language: موضعك المقدس يارب الذى أعددته يداك يارب تملك منذ الأزل والآن والى الأبد.
Je aui~ e~qoun e~v~iom n~je nih~ywr n~te Varaw~ nem nefbere[woutc nem nef[acih~yo.
For the horses of Pharaoh went with his chariots and his horsemen into the sea.

language.div: Sebab telah masu~k ke laut kuda-kuda Firaun Kereta dan penunggangnya

text.language: لأنه قد دخل الى البحر خيل فرعون ومركباته وفرسانه.
APo#c# en pimwou n~te v~iom e~h~r/i e~jwou: nens/ri de m~Pic~ra/l naumosi qen petsouw~ou qen y~m/] m~v~iom.
And the Lord brought back the waters of the sea on them, but the children of Israel went on dry land in the midst of the sea.

language.div: Dan Tuhan kembalikan air laut ke atas mereka, tetapi bangsa Israel lewati tanah yang kering
di tengah laut.

text.language: والرب غمرهم بماء البحر أما بنو اسرائيل فكانوا يمشون على اليابسة فى وسط البحر.
Ac[i de nac n~je Mariam ]p~rov/t/c t~cwni n~Aa~rwn m~pikemkem qen necjij: ouoh aui~ e~bol camenh/c n~je nihio~mi t/rou qen hankemkem nem hanhwc.
Then Miriam the prophetess, the sister of Aaron, took the timbrel in her hand, and all the women went out after her with timbrels and with praises.

language.div: Dan Miryam, nabiah, saudari Harun, ambil rebana di tangannya, dan semua wanita ikuti dia dengan rebana dan pujian.

text.language: فأخذت مريم النبية أخت هرون الدف بيديها وخرج فى إثرها جميع النسوة بالدفوف والتسابيح.
Acerh/tc de qajwou n~je Mariam ecjw m~moc: je marenhwc e~Po#c#: je qen ouw~ou gar af[iw~ou.
And Miriam answered them, saying, “Let us sing to the Lord for He has triumphed gloriously.”

language.div: Dan Miryam memimpin m’reka berkata: Mari nyanyi bagi Tuhan, S’bab Dia telah menang
dengan gemilang."

text.language: وبدأت مريم فى مقدمتهن تقول فلنسبح الرب لأنه بالمجد قد تمجد.
Ouh~yo nem ou[acih~yo afberbwrou e~v~iom: je marenhwc e~Po#c#: je qen ouw~ou gar af[iw~ou.
“The horse and its rider He has thrown into the sea. Let us sing to the Lord for He has triumphed gloriously.”

language.div: Kuda dan penunggangnya, Dia lempar ke laut. "Mari nyanyi bagi Tuhan, s’bab Dia telah menang dengan gemilang."

text.language: الفرس وراكب الفرس طرحهما فى البحر فلنسبح الرب لأنه بالمجد قد تمجد.

Title.language: Psali Adam (Lobsh) for the First Canticle

text.language: Qen ouswt afswt: n~je pimwou n~te v~iom: ouoh v~noun ets/k: afswpi n~oumam~mosi.
With the split: the waters of the sea split: and the very deep: became a walkway.

language.div: Dengan terbelahnya, air laut terbelah, Dan tempat terdalam, menjadi jalan setapak.

text.language: قطعا انقطع ماء البحر والعمق العميق صار مسلكا.
Oukahi n~ayouwnh: a~v~r/ sai hijwf: oumwit n~atcini: aumosi hiwtf.
A hidden earth: was shone upon by the sun: and the untrodden road: was walked upon.

language.div: Bumi yang tersembuni, Disinari matahari, Dan jalan yang tak terinjak
telah dilalui.

text.language: أرض غير ظاهرة أشرقت الشمس عليها وطريق غير مسلوكة مشوا عليها.
Oumwou efb/l e~bol: afo~hi e~ratf: qen ouhwb n~s~v/ri: m~paradoxon.
The flowing water: stood still: by a miraculous: act of wonder.

language.div: Air yang mengalir, Tegak berdiri, Oleh mujizat, perbuatan yang ajaib

text.language: ماء منحل وقف بفعل عجيب معجز.
Varaw~ nem nefharma: auwmc e~pec/t: nens/ri m~Pic#l#: auerjinior m~v~iom.
Pharaoh and his chariots: were drowned: and the children of Israel: crossed the sea.

language.div: Firaun dan keretanya, Tenggelam, dan bangsa Israel, menyeberangi laut.

text.language: غرق فرعون ومركباته وعبر بنو اسرائيل البحر.
Enafhwc qajwou pe: n~je Mwu~c/c pip~rov/t/c: san~tef[itou e~qoun: hi p~safe n~Cina.
And in front of them: was Moses the prophet praising: until he brought them: to the wilderness of Sinai.

language.div: Dan di depan mereka, Nabi Musa memuji, sampai dia membawa m’reka, ke padang gurun Sinai.

text.language: وكان موسى النبى يسبح قدامهم حتى أدخلهم برية سيناء.
Enafhwc e~V]: qen taihwd/ m~beri: je marenhwc e~Po#c#: je qen ouw~ou gar af[iw~ou.
And they were praising God: with this new psalmody: saying, “Let us sing to the Lord: for He has triumphed gloriously.”

language.div: Dan mereka memuji Allah, dengan mazmur baru ini, berkata, "Mari nyanyi bagi Tuhan, s’bab Dia telah menang dengan gemilang."

text.language: وكانوا يسبحون الله بهذه التسبحة الجديدة قائلين فلنسبح الرب لأنه بالمجد قد تمجد.
Hiten nieu,/: n~te Mwu~c/c piar,/p~rov/t/c: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers: of Moses the archprophet: O Lord grant us: the forgiveness of our sins.

language.div: Dengan doa Musa, Pemimpin para nabi, Ya Tuhan, berikanlah kami pengampunan untuk dosa kami.

text.language: بصلوات موسى رئيس الأنبياء يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
Hiten nip~recbia: n~te ]yeo~tokoc e#y#u# Maria: Po#c# a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions of: the Mother of God Saint Mary: O Lord grant us: the forgiveness of our sins.

language.div: Dengan syafaat, Theotokos Santa Maria, ya Tuhan berikanlah kami pengampunan untuk dosa kami

text.language: بشفاعات والدة الاله القديسة مريم يارب أنعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
